iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Serbia
iati-activity.description: Child Rights in Secondary Schools. The project 'Child Rights in Secondary Schools' is active response to the need of children to be protected from child abuse, neglect and violence as well as the need of educational institutions to systematically respond to the requirement to decrease the rate of violations of child rights in schools. The overall objective of the project is to build sustainable capacities in secondary schools for protection, promotion and implementation of child rights and especially the protection of child abuse, neglect and violence. The project will work on building capacities of the children to act as active agents of their teachers who will support them and build partnerships with them. It will provide number of relevant trainings for over 125 children (15-18 years old) and to 15 of their teachers from five secondary schools in Uzice. Once the trainings are implemented children and teachers will be encouraged and supported to plan school campaigns aimed at promotion of child rights.
